properties.name: user.purgetokens.cron.expression
properties.description: Cron expression for token purge schedule

properties.name: user.security.protectedURIs
properties.description: Comma-delimited list of URIs that require authentication

properties.name: user.security.unprotectedURIs
properties.description: Comma-delimited list of URIs that don't require authentication

properties.name: user.security.logoutSuccessURI
properties.description: URI to redirect to after successful logout

properties.name: user.security.loginSuccessURI
properties.description: URI to redirect to after successful login

properties.name: user.security.registrationNewVerificationURI
properties.description: URI for requesting new verification email

properties.name: user.mail.fromAddress
properties.description: From address for emails sent by the system

properties.name: user.security.failedLoginAttempts
properties.description: Number of allowed failed login attempts before account lockout

properties.name: user.security.updateUserURI
properties.description: URI for user profile update page

properties.name: user.security.forgotPasswordPendingURI
properties.description: URI for forgot password pending page

properties.name: user.security.defaultAction
properties.description: Default security action (allow or deny) for URIs not explicitly configured

properties.name: user.security.disableCSRFURIs
properties.description: Comma-delimited list of URIs that should not be protected by CSRF protection

properties.name: user.security.registrationPendingURI
properties.description: URI for registration pending verification page

properties.name: user.security.forgotPasswordChangeURI
properties.description: URI for password change page after reset

properties.name: user.audit.flushOnWrite
properties.description: Flush audit log on each write

properties.name: user.security.testHashTime
properties.description: Test BCrypt hash time on startup

properties.name: spring.devtools.livereload.https
properties.description: Enable HTTPS for Spring DevTools LiveReload

properties.name: user.actuallyDeleteAccount
properties.description: Actually delete user accounts (true) or just disable them (false)

properties.name: user.security.rememberMe.key
properties.description: Secret key for remember-me token generation

properties.name: user.security.alwaysUseDefaultTargetUrl
properties.description: Always redirect to default target URL after login

properties.name: user.web.globalUserModelOptIn
properties.description: Add user to model by default (true) or only with annotation (false)
